MPD Tool – Introduction

Talaria TWO MPD Demo Tool is a GUI tool that enables quick evaluation of power consumption and throughput performances of Talaria TWO modules. This tool is bundled with two applications:

  • Multipurpose Demo (MPD) primarily intended to verify power consumption under various protocol scenarios (such as TCP, UDP, HTTP etc.)

  • iPerf3 application to showcase throughput performance

  • Standard scan and Low power scan, which enables to configure different scan feature

This GUI is intended for use with the INP3010 and INP3011 Talaria TWO evaluation boards to enable easy programming and accelerated evaluations.

  • Prerequisites
    • Using MPD Tool in Linux
    • Microsoft Visual C++ Redistributable Software Package

  • MPD modes

    • Keep Alive Mode
    • TCP

    • HTTP
    • HTTPS
    • MQTT
    • Multicast Reception OFF GRAT ARP ON

Iperf3

  • Iperf3 Modes
    • UDP Throughput Test Downlink
    • UDP Throughput Test Uplink
    • TCP Throughput Test Downlink
    • TCP Throughput Test Uplink

Scan

  • scan Modes
    • Case 1: Standard Wi-Fi Scan
    • Case 2: Low Power Wi-Fi Smart Scan
